entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Saint Andrews
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 p.m. ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain. Low minus 1 except temperature rising to plus 4 over Grand Manan Island.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain over Grand Manan Island. Rainfall amount 20 mm over Grand Manan Island. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1 except temperature rising to plus 4 over Grand Manan Island. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:59 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:59 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then clearing. Fog patches dissipating late in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 7:59 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
